content: Hello! Does anyone have an idea of whether the IG Publisher could handle a case where a logical model inherits a backbone element from a parent, and then adds a new sub-element to the inherited backbone element? The spec doesn't seem to explicitly prohibit this, but if the IG Publisher does not handle this case very well then we won't allow it in sushi.
you'll have to try, I don't know whether it will work. The spec doesn't say yay or nay, and so I don't know what the code does
